blog.description: Hailee. I love Harry Styles. I write fanfiction. Follow me and I'll follow you back. Requests are always open! Or just chat with me, I'll answer your wildest and craziest questions! MASTERLIST IS HERE!

body:
Neighbors - part 2

Warnings: slightly smutty?

Harry suggests you both start to unpack your bedroom, so you can get some sleep later that night. Though to be truthful, right now there was no way you’d be able to sleep, you were buzzing with energy, barely able to hold in your excitement that HARRY STYLES WAS IN YOUR APARTMENT.

You’re unpacking your bathroom stuff, not really wanting Harry to see all your countless skin products that did nothing to make your skin better, or your girly products. No need to scare him off. Last time you checked, he was making your bed, smoothing out your rose-patterned duvet and plumping up your pillows. Some music was playing quietly from his phone, the atmosphere was relaxed.

After a few minutes, you realise he’s gone quite quiet. So, you decide to just poke your head around the door that connects the ensuite to the bedroom. But as soon as your eyes contact the scene in front of you, you gasp. “HARRY STYLES!” You practically fly over to him, snatching the red lace panties from his grasp. You’re speechless, and just stand there, gaping, mouth opening and closing like a fish. He smiles sweetly at you. “ s'just putting your clothes away, love.” Love. Your heart flutters like butterflies. “Well, uh, don’t-don’t, uh, don’t do that!” He sniggers, standing up and walking over to you. One hand gently brushes your face, one on your hip. Your cheeks burn, and you look into his beautiful green eyes. “But i like doin’ tha’ love” he protests. Then his lips are on yours, and all you can think about is him. Oh, how good it feels, his soft soft lips melting into yours. You could stand here forever in this moment, as your brain tried to frantically work out how in hell you ended up making out with Harry Styles.

You pull back, not sure what to think. You’ve heard so many rumours, about how he’s a player, a womanizer, but at this point, you want him so bad! “I-uh-we, we shouldn’t be doing this!” He looks up, and you’re sure he can read your mind, see into your soul. “Why can’t we do it, lovie? Wha’s wrong abou’ it?” And with that, he pulls you toward your bed. And you give in, letting him do what he wants to you.

blog.name: oh-styles
blog.title: o h s t y l e s

tags: wow this made me extra emo
summary: Can we talk about how SAAF y/n and H behave after a huge argument now that they’re a couple and they can’t really just dip like...
question: Can we talk about how SAAF y/n and H behave after a huge argument now that they’re a couple and they can’t really just dip like they’re use to?
answer:
whoooops i changed pov’s half way through

Especially after their very first fight; it’s awkward.

They do kind of try to avoid each other for a bit afterwards. Dipping in and out of the room when they see the other, dodging each other’s eyes like school children, muttering a quick “sorry” when they accidentally run into the other. When she goes into the hotel room to grab her phone charger, and she sees him on the bed flipping through television channels, she sort of just gives him a half-assed smile and grabs what she needs and leaves.

The two of them both know they need to suck it up and just talk.

He is so used to just letting things fizzle out on their own, and she is used to running away.

I think he reaches a point after two days of silence that he finds her in Sarah’s dressing room, and requests to speak with her alone. He locks the door behind him, sits backwards in a chair and just stares at her like he’s the parent waiting for his child to apologize.

“I don’t like not talking to you.”

“And I don’t like being told you regret being with me.”

“I didn’t mean that—”

And that’s where it begins; the boiling point finally reaches the brim and bubbles over.

“I don’t like telling you I don’t like dating people, and then deciding to date you anyway, and then you go ahead and tell me you regret it!”

And she got him there.

Yeah, he deserves her cold shoulder. Hell, when the news began to spread about the topic of their fight, it wasn’t just her acting a little quieter around Harry.

“I know when you’re stressed or mad you say shit you don’t mean, but really, Harry? You say that? I should leave, you know. Just go home. I thought about it. I got as far as booking a ticket, twice, and cancelling it.”

And now he’s the child being scolded by their parent.

“I only stayed because I need the money…and you know that. I’m broke without this job. I’m sure I could get my server job back, but it can’t pay all the bills.”

“I regret dragging you into this.”

He runs his hands down his face in defeat, rubbing at his eyes angrily with his knuckles. The guilt has ate at him since the very first time there was an article about him with a mystery woman, and the fans were like piranhas trying to figure out who you were. He feels lucky that photos are far and few, but the hate will forever linger as long as you are by his side, and he knows he can’t protect you from everything.

The flashbacks of Eleanor getting attacked by fans at the airport make his stomach turn, and he does everything he can to prevent that from happening to you.

From the very first day, all he has wanted to do was protect you, but being with him comes with his battles – ones that you overlook – but he nevertheless sees them with every turn of his head.

“I am tired of seeing you get hurt over what they say about you.”

Even with a brave smile, he can always see right through you.

Last week alone, you blocked 15 hate pages on Instagram, and 30 on Twitter. Even with all of your social media on private, they still were able to find you with a blink of the eye, but I guess it wasn’t hard when his entire family follows you.

“I am sorry, okay? I don’t want you to think I don’t want to be with you—fuck, if you would have gone home, I would have got on a plane and dragged your ass back here. Things have been tough, for the both of us, and I am sorry.”

question: I remember the story the anon was talking about... I think it was basically the friend was dating harry and thought he was too nice or something, so she asked YN to call him on the phone and tell him that her friend is breaking up wit him and then one day harry hears YN’s voice somewhere I think a club or coffee shop and recognizes it from the phone call and is a dick to her... I cant remember if they get to know each other + date after that tho? Just remember the first part of like 2 or 3 chaps

title: Too Far
body:
What happens when the outside world isn’t what Alia thought it would be. Will she cope? Or will it destroy her completely?

Home Sweetheart

Today I turn 17 which means, dad finally lets me out of the house. Yea I know. It sounds weird. Who’s on ‘house arrest’ for the first 16 years old their life? The Prime Minister’s daughter is who….

Read more…
